commands.name: axolotl
commands.description: sends a random image of an axolotl

commands.name: updown
commands.description: sends the text back, but upsidedown

commands.name: suntzu <text>
commands.description: makes a fake Sun Tzu quote

commands.name: text <text>
commands.description: sends what you say as an image

commands.name: clear
commands.description: clears the specified amount of messages

commands.name: kick <user> <reason>
commands.description: kicks the specified user from the server

commands.name: ban <user> <reason>
commands.description: bans the specified user from the server

commands.name: unban <userID>
commands.description: unbans the user specified from their user ID
